Key.English: Player Combat Support (Artillery)
Artillery Module for ALiVE Combat Support
Place Module and set the settings accordingly! Sync to a Combat Support Module!
Callsign
Enter the Callsign, ensure that it is unique
Arty\Mortar Type
Type of Arty or Mortar e.g. BUS_MotInf_MortTeam
Number of HE Rounds
Set the number of rounds of HE available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Number of ILLUM Rounds
Set the number of rounds of ILLUM available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Number of SMOKE Rounds
Set the number of rounds of SMOKE available for the asset - Used by all Arty\Mortar Assets
Number of GUIDED Rounds
Set the number of rounds of ROCKET available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Number of CLUSTER Rounds
Set the number of rounds of CLUSTERS available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Number of Laser Guided Rounds
Set the number of rounds of LG available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Number of MINE Rounds
Set the number of rounds of MINE available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Number of AT MINES Rounds
Set the number of rounds of AT MINES available for the asset - Only used by MBT
Number of ROCKET Rounds
Set the number of rounds of 230mm Titan Missile available for the asset - Only used by MLRS
Code
Code that will be ran on each artillery piece
